description: Read entire PDFs or specific pages on demand. Search documents for keywords and jump to relevant passages. Retrieve metadata to quickly understand document properties.

capabilities.name: read_pdf
capabilities.description: Read and extract text content from a PDF file. Returns the full text content and metadata.

capabilities.name: read_pdf_page
capabilities.description: Read a specific page or range of pages from a PDF file.

capabilities.name: get_pdf_metadata
capabilities.description: Get metadata information from a PDF file without reading all content.

capabilities.name: search_pdf
capabilities.description: Search for specific text within a PDF file.
